casebody.data:
Pedro S.
v.
Commissioner of Correction Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 27, 2016

David B. Rozwaski, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Pedro S.'s petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn. App. 903, 137 A.3d 968 (2016), is denied.

EVELEIGH, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
